title: The Best Game at Nintendo Indie World - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.11.22
description:
Greg and Janet are ready to argue about the best game they saw this morning. Strap in!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:49 - Housekeeping

We got up early, so show us some love and watch our Nintendo Indie World reactions on youtube.com/kindafunygames!

The Roper Report  -

00:12:40 - Nintendo Indie World Wrap-Up
00:39:55 - Ads
00:42:07 - PlayStation Says First-Party Games Would 'Deteriorate' If They Launched Onto PS Plus On Day One
00:46:05 - Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order Dev Claims Requests for a Black and/or Female Lead Were Rejected
00:53:02 - Nintendo says the transition to its next console is ‘a major concern for us’
00:59:30 - EA Teases Four Games in 2023 Including a New Remake and Major IP
01:04:42 - FY Quick Hits!
01:06:18 - Elden Ring Sales!
01:07:26 - Out today
01:08:54 - Squad Up: Jake Osburn - PS5 - JustThatGood184
01:10:40 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Tim
